title: Network File System
description: Simplified distributed file system with support for concurrency, versioning, and multiple clients; core parts include name server, storage server, and client components.

title: shAI
description: CLI tool that translates natural language queries into safe, executable bash commands using local LLM inference with Ollama.

title: C-Shell
description: Custom C shell implementation (no README details provided), likely a command-line interpreter project in C for learning OS/process concepts.

title: Diet Manager

title: TradeHub E-Commerce Website
description: An e-commerce marketplace (TradeHub) built using the MERN stack with modern UI inspired by design principles — includes both backend and frontend code.

title: HMS Project (Hotel Management System)
